00024 #ifndef HDFIO_H
00025 #define HDFIO_H

00038 template <typename T>
00039 inline hid_t 
00040 GetDataType( void ) {
00041   if ( typeid( T ) == typeid( int ) )
00042     return H5T_NATIVE_INT;
00043 
00044   if ( typeid( T ) == typeid( unsigned ) )
00045     return H5T_NATIVE_UINT;
00046 
00047   if ( typeid( T ) == typeid( float ) )
00048     return H5T_NATIVE_FLOAT;
00049 
00050   if ( typeid( T ) == typeid( double ) )
00051     return H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE;
00052 
00053   std::cerr << " - Error: [HDF_IO] trying to evaluate unsupported type in GetDataType!" << std::endl << std::endl;
00054   return -1;
00055 }
00056 
00057 class HDFException : public std::runtime_error {
00058  public:
00059   HDFException( const std::string &errtxt ) : std::runtime_error( errtxt ) { }
00060 }
00061 ;
00062 
00063 inline bool 
00064 DoesFileExist( std::string Filename ) {
00065   bool flag = false;
00066   std::fstream fin( Filename.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary );
00067   if ( fin.is_open() )
00068     flag = true;
00069   fin.close();
00070   return flag;
00071 }
00072 
00073 inline void 
00074 AssertFileOpen( std::string Filename ) {
00075   if ( !DoesFileExist( Filename ) ) {
00076     std::fstream fout( Filename.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::binary );
00077     fout.close();
00078   }
00079 }
00080 
00081 inline void 
00082 HDFCreateFile( std::string Filename ) {
00083   hid_t HDF_FileID;
00084   HDF_FileID = H5Fcreate( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_TRUNC, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT );
00085   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00086 }
00087 
00088 template < typename T>
00089 inline void 
00090 HDFReadVector( const std::string Filename, const std::string ObjName, std::vector<T> &Data ) {
00091   HDFReadDataset( Filename, ObjName, Data );
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 inline void 
00096 HDFGetDatasetExtent( const std::string Filename, const std::string ObjName, std::vector<int> &Extent ) {
00097   hid_t HDF_FileID, HDF_DatasetID, HDF_DataspaceID;
00098 
00099   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT );
00100 
00101   // save old error handler
00102   herr_t ( *old_func ) ( void* );
00103   void *old_client_data;
00104 
00105   H5Eget_auto( &old_func, &old_client_data );
00106 
00107   // turn off error handling by hdf5 library
00108   H5Eset_auto( NULL, NULL );
00109 
00110   // probe dataset opening
00111   HDF_DatasetID = H5Dopen( HDF_FileID, ObjName.c_str() );
00112 
00113   // restore previous error handler
00114   H5Eset_auto( old_func, old_client_data );
00115 
00116   // dataset did not exist or was empty
00117   if ( HDF_DatasetID < 0 ) {
00118     std::stringstream ss;
00119     ss << " - Warning: dataset \'" << ObjName.c_str() << "\' does not exist or is empty." << std::endl;
00120     H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00121     throw HDFException( ss.str() );
00122     return ;
00123   }
00124 
00125   // get space associated with dataset and its extensions
00126   HDF_DataspaceID = H5Dget_space( HDF_DatasetID );
00127 
00128   int ndims = H5Sget_simple_extent_ndims( HDF_DataspaceID );
00129 
00130   hsize_t dimsize[ ndims ];
00131 
00132   H5Sget_simple_extent_dims( HDF_DataspaceID, dimsize, NULL );
00133 
00134   Extent.clear();
00135   for ( int i = 0; i < ndims; ++i )
00136     Extent.push_back( dimsize[ i ] );
00137 
00138   H5Sclose( HDF_DataspaceID );
00139   H5Dclose( HDF_DatasetID );
00140   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00141 }
00142 
00143 template < typename T >
00144 inline void 
00145 HDFReadDataset( const std::string Filename, const std::string ObjName, std::vector<T> &Data ) {
00146 
00147   hid_t HDF_Type, HDF_FileID, HDF_DatasetID, HDF_DataspaceID;
00148   hsize_t HDF_StorageSize;
00149 
00150   HDF_Type = GetDataType<T>();
00151 
00152   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT );
00153 
00154 
00155   // save old error handler
00156   herr_t ( *old_func ) ( void* );
00157   void *old_client_data;
00158 
00159   H5Eget_auto( &old_func, &old_client_data );
00160 
00161   // turn off error handling by hdf5 library
00162   H5Eset_auto( NULL, NULL );
00163 
00164   // probe dataset opening
00165   HDF_DatasetID = H5Dopen( HDF_FileID, ObjName.c_str() );
00166 
00167   // restore previous error handler
00168   H5Eset_auto( old_func, old_client_data );
00169 
00170   // dataset did not exist or was empty
00171   if ( HDF_DatasetID < 0 ) {
00172     std::stringstream ss;
00173     ss << " - Warning: dataset \'" << ObjName.c_str() << "\' does not exist or is empty." << std::endl;
00174     Data.clear();
00175     H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00176     throw HDFException( ss.str() );
00177     return ;
00178   }
00179 
00180   // get space associated with dataset and its extensions
00181   HDF_DataspaceID = H5Dget_space( HDF_DatasetID );
00182 
00183   int ndims = H5Sget_simple_extent_ndims( HDF_DataspaceID );
00184 
00185   hsize_t dimsize[ ndims ];
00186 
00187   H5Sget_simple_extent_dims( HDF_DataspaceID, dimsize, NULL );
00188 
00189   HDF_StorageSize = 1;
00190   for ( int i = 0; i < ndims; ++i )
00191     HDF_StorageSize *= dimsize[ i ];
00192 
00193   // adjust the array size to hold the data
00194   Data.clear();
00195   Data.reserve( HDF_StorageSize );
00196   Data.assign( HDF_StorageSize, ( T ) 1 );
00197 
00198   if ( Data.capacity() < HDF_StorageSize ) {
00199     std::cerr << " - Error: not enough memory to store all data in HDFReadDataset!" << std::endl;
00200     abort();
00201   }
00202 
00203   // read the dataset
00204   H5Dread( HDF_DatasetID, HDF_Type, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, &Data[ 0 ] );
00205 
00206   if ( Data.size() != HDF_StorageSize ) {
00207     std::cerr << " - Error: something went wrong while reading!" << std::endl;
00208     abort();
00209   }
00210 
00211   H5Sclose( HDF_DataspaceID );
00212   H5Dclose( HDF_DatasetID );
00213   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00214 }
00215 
00216 template <typename T >
00217 inline void 
00218 HDFReadSelect( const std::string Filename, const std::string ObjName, const std::vector<unsigned>& ii, std::vector<T> &Data ) {
00219 
00220   hid_t HDF_Type, HDF_FileID, HDF_DatasetID, HDF_DataspaceID, HDF_MemspaceID;
00221   hsize_t HDF_StorageSize;
00222 
00223   HDF_Type = GetDataType<T>();
00224 
00225   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT );
00226 
00227 
00228   // save old error handler
00229   herr_t ( *old_func ) ( void* );
00230   void *old_client_data;
00231 
00232   H5Eget_auto( &old_func, &old_client_data );
00233 
00234   // turn off error handling by hdf5 library
00235   H5Eset_auto( NULL, NULL );
00236 
00237   // probe dataset opening
00238   HDF_DatasetID = H5Dopen( HDF_FileID, ObjName.c_str() );
00239 
00240   // restore previous error handler
00241   H5Eset_auto( old_func, old_client_data );
00242 
00243   // dataset did not exist or was empty
00244   if ( HDF_DatasetID < 0 ) {
00245     std::stringstream ss;
00246     ss << " - Warning: dataset \'" << ObjName.c_str() << "\' does not exist or is empty." << std::endl;
00247     Data.clear();
00248     H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00249     throw HDFException( ss.str() );
00250   }
00251 
00252   // get space associated with dataset and its extensions
00253   HDF_DataspaceID = H5Dget_space( HDF_DatasetID );
00254 
00255   hsize_t block[ 2 ];
00256   block[ 0 ] = ii.size();
00257   block[ 1 ] = 1;
00258 
00259 
00260   Data.clear();
00261   Data.reserve( block[ 0 ] * block[ 1 ] );
00262   Data.assign( block[ 0 ] * block[ 1 ], ( T ) 1 );
00263 
00264   HDF_MemspaceID = H5Screate_simple( 2, block, NULL );
00265   // H5Sselect_hyperslab( FilespaceID, H5S_SELECT_SET, offset, stride, count, block );
00266   H5Sselect_elements( HDF_DataspaceID, H5S_SELECT_SET, ii.size(), ( const hsize_t ** ) & ii[ 0 ] );
00267 
00268   H5Dread( HDF_DatasetID, HDF_Type, HDF_MemspaceID, HDF_DataspaceID, H5P_DEFAULT, &Data[ 0 ] );
00269 
00270   H5Sclose( HDF_DataspaceID );
00271   H5Sclose( HDF_MemspaceID );
00272   H5Dclose( HDF_DatasetID );
00273   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00274 
00275 }
00276 
00277 template <typename T >
00278 inline void 
00279 HDFReadVectorSelect( const std::string Filename, const std::string ObjName, const std::vector<unsigned>& ii, std::vector<T> &Data ) {
00280 
00281   hid_t HDF_Type, HDF_FileID, HDF_DatasetID, HDF_DataspaceID, HDF_MemspaceID;
00282   // hsize_t HDF_StorageSize;
00283 
00284   HDF_Type = GetDataType<T>();
00285 
00286   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT );
00287 
00288 
00289   // save old error handler
00290   herr_t ( *old_func ) ( void* );
00291   void *old_client_data;
00292 
00293   H5Eget_auto( &old_func, &old_client_data );
00294 
00295   // turn off error handling by hdf5 library
00296   H5Eset_auto( NULL, NULL );
00297 
00298   // probe dataset opening
00299   HDF_DatasetID = H5Dopen( HDF_FileID, ObjName.c_str() );
00300 
00301   // restore previous error handler
00302   H5Eset_auto( old_func, old_client_data );
00303 
00304   // dataset did not exist or was empty
00305   if ( HDF_DatasetID < 0 ) {
00306     std::stringstream ss;
00307     ss << " - Warning: dataset \'" << ObjName.c_str() << "\' does not exist or is empty." << std::endl;
00308     Data.clear();
00309     H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00310     throw HDFException( ss.str() );
00311     return ;
00312   }
00313 
00314   // get space associated with dataset and its extensions
00315   HDF_DataspaceID = H5Dget_space( HDF_DatasetID );
00316   int ndims = H5Sget_simple_extent_ndims( HDF_DataspaceID );
00317   hsize_t dimsize[ ndims ];
00318   H5Sget_simple_extent_dims( HDF_DataspaceID, dimsize, NULL );
00319 
00320   hsize_t block[ 2 ];
00321   block[ 0 ] = ii.size();
00322   block[ 1 ] = 3;
00323 
00324   std::vector<hsize_t> coord;
00325   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < ii.size(); ++i )
00326     for ( unsigned k = 0; k < 3; ++k ) {
00327       coord.push_back( ii[ i ] );
00328       coord.push_back( k );
00329     }
00330   // std::vector<unsigned>().swap(ii);
00331 
00332   if ( ii.size() == 0 ) {
00333     std::cerr << "attempted to read empty block. skipping..." << std::endl;
00334     return ;
00335   }
00336   std::cerr << "starting 2 read...\n";
00337   H5Sselect_none( HDF_DataspaceID );
00338   if ( H5Sselect_elements( HDF_DataspaceID, H5S_SELECT_SET, coord.size() / 2, ( const hsize_t ** ) & coord[ 0 ] ) < 0 )    //(const hsize_t**)&coord[0] ) < 0 )
00339     std::cerr << " - could not select elements properly\n";
00340 
00341   if ( H5Sselect_valid( HDF_DataspaceID ) <= 0 ) {
00342     std::cerr << " - sorry, invalid element selection in file \'" << Filename.c_str() << "\'." << std::endl;
00343     std::cerr << " - dumping 10 first indices..." << std::endl;
00344 
00345     for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 10; ++i ) {
00346       for ( unsigned k = 0; k < 3; ++k ) {
00347     std::cerr << coord[ 3 * i + k ] << " ";
00348       }
00349       std::cerr << std::endl;
00350     }
00351 
00352     return ;
00353   }
00354 
00355   std::vector<hsize_t>().swap( coord );
00356   Data.assign( block[ 0 ] * block[ 1 ], ( T ) 0 );
00357   HDF_MemspaceID = H5Screate_simple( 2, &block[ 0 ], NULL );
00358 
00359   H5Dread( HDF_DatasetID, HDF_Type, HDF_MemspaceID, HDF_DataspaceID, H5P_DEFAULT, &Data[ 0 ] );
00360 
00361   H5Sclose( HDF_DataspaceID );
00362   H5Sclose( HDF_MemspaceID );
00363   H5Dclose( HDF_DatasetID );
00364   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00365 }
00366 
00367 template < typename T >
00368 inline void 
00369 HDFReadVectorSlab( const std::string Filename, const std::string ObjName, unsigned nStart, unsigned nCount, std::vector<T> &Data ) {
00370   hsize_t offset[ 2 ], stride[ 2 ], count[ 2 ], block[ 2 ];
00371 
00372   hid_t MemspaceID, FilespaceID, DatasetID, FileID;
00373   hid_t Type = GetDataType<T>();
00374 
00375   FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT );
00376 
00377   // save old error handler
00378   herr_t ( *old_func ) ( void* );
00379   void *old_client_data;
00380 
00381   H5Eget_auto( &old_func, &old_client_data );
00382 
00383   // turn off error handling by hdf5 library
00384   H5Eset_auto( NULL, NULL );
00385 
00386   // probe dataset opening
00387   DatasetID = H5Dopen( FileID, ObjName.c_str() );
00388 
00389   // restore previous error handler
00390   H5Eset_auto( old_func, old_client_data );
00391 
00392   // dataset did not exist or was empty
00393   if ( DatasetID < 0 ) {
00394     std::stringstream ss;
00395     ss << " - Warning: dataset \'" << ObjName.c_str() << "\' does not exist or is empty." << std::endl;
00396     Data.clear();
00397     H5Fclose( FileID );
00398     throw HDFException( ss.str() );
00399     return ;
00400   }
00401 
00402   FilespaceID = H5Dget_space( DatasetID );
00403 
00404   offset[ 0 ] = nStart;
00405   offset[ 1 ] = 0;
00406 
00407   count[ 0 ] = 1;
00408   count[ 1 ] = 1;
00409 
00410   stride[ 0 ] = 1;
00411   stride[ 1 ] = 1;
00412 
00413   block[ 0 ] = nCount;
00414   block[ 1 ] = 3;
00415 
00416 
00417   Data.clear();
00418   Data.reserve( block[ 0 ] * block[ 1 ] );
00419   Data.assign( block[ 0 ] * block[ 1 ], ( T ) 1 );
00420 
00421   MemspaceID = H5Screate_simple( 2, block, NULL );
00422   H5Sselect_hyperslab( FilespaceID, H5S_SELECT_SET, offset, stride, count, block );
00423 
00424   H5Dread( DatasetID, Type, MemspaceID, FilespaceID, H5P_DEFAULT, &Data[ 0 ] );
00425 
00426   H5Sclose( FilespaceID );
00427   H5Sclose( MemspaceID );
00428   H5Dclose( DatasetID );
00429   H5Fclose( FileID );
00430 }
00431 
00432 template < typename T >
00433 inline void 
00434 HDFReadDatasetSlab( const std::string Filename, const std::string ObjName, unsigned nStart, unsigned nCount, std::vector<T> &Data ) {
00435   hsize_t
00436     offset[ 2 ],
00437     stride[ 2 ],
00438     count[ 2 ],
00439     block[ 2 ];
00440 
00441   hid_t MemspaceID, FilespaceID, DatasetID, FileID;
00442   hid_t Type = GetDataType<T>();
00443 
00444   FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT );
00445 
00446   // save old error handler
00447   herr_t ( *old_func ) ( void* );
00448   void *old_client_data;
00449 
00450   H5Eget_auto( &old_func, &old_client_data );
00451 
00452   // turn off error handling by hdf5 library
00453   H5Eset_auto( NULL, NULL );
00454 
00455   // probe dataset opening
00456   DatasetID = H5Dopen( FileID, ObjName.c_str() );
00457 
00458   // restore previous error handler
00459   H5Eset_auto( old_func, old_client_data );
00460 
00461   // dataset did not exist or was empty
00462   if ( DatasetID < 0 ) {
00463     std::stringstream ss;
00464     ss << " - Warning: dataset \'" << ObjName.c_str() << "\' does not exist or is empty." << std::endl;
00465     Data.clear();
00466     H5Fclose( FileID );
00467     throw HDFException( ss.str() );
00468     return ;
00469   }
00470 
00471   FilespaceID = H5Dget_space( DatasetID );
00472 
00473   offset[ 0 ] = nStart;
00474   offset[ 1 ] = 0;
00475 
00476   count[ 0 ] = 1;
00477   count[ 1 ] = 1;
00478 
00479   stride[ 0 ] = 1;
00480   stride[ 1 ] = 1;
00481 
00482   block[ 0 ] = nCount;
00483   block[ 1 ] = 1;
00484 
00485   Data.clear();
00486   Data.reserve( block[ 0 ] * block[ 1 ] );
00487   Data.assign( block[ 0 ] * block[ 1 ], ( T ) 1 );
00488 
00489   MemspaceID = H5Screate_simple( 2, block, NULL );
00490   H5Sselect_hyperslab( FilespaceID, H5S_SELECT_SET, offset, stride, count, block );
00491 
00492   H5Dread( DatasetID, Type, MemspaceID, FilespaceID, H5P_DEFAULT, &Data[ 0 ] );
00493 
00494   H5Sclose( FilespaceID );
00495   H5Sclose( MemspaceID );
00496   H5Dclose( DatasetID );
00497   H5Fclose( FileID );
00498 }
00499 
00500 template < typename T>
00501 inline void 
00502 HDFReadGroupAttribute( const std::string Filename, const std::string GroupName, const std::string ObjName, T &Data ) {
00503 
00504   hid_t HDF_Type, HDF_FileID, HDF_GroupID, HDF_AttributeID;
00505   // hsize_t HDF_StorageSize;
00506 
00507   HDF_Type = GetDataType<T>();
00508 
00509   // save old error handler
00510   herr_t ( *old_func ) ( void* );
00511   void *old_client_data;
00512 
00513   H5Eget_auto( &old_func, &old_client_data );
00514 
00515   // turn off error handling by hdf5 library
00516   H5Eset_auto( NULL, NULL );
00517 
00518   // attempt to open attribute
00519   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT );
00520   HDF_GroupID = H5Gopen( HDF_FileID, GroupName.c_str() );
00521   HDF_AttributeID = H5Aopen_name( HDF_GroupID, ObjName.c_str() );
00522 
00523   if ( HDF_FileID < 0 || HDF_GroupID < 0 || HDF_AttributeID < 0 ) {
00524     std::stringstream ss;
00525     if ( HDF_FileID < 0 )
00526       ss << "FileError";
00527     ss << " - Warning: attribute \'" << GroupName.c_str() << "/" << ObjName.c_str() << "\' does not exist or is empty." << std::endl;
00528     H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00529     throw HDFException( ss.str() );
00530     return ;
00531   }
00532 
00533   H5Aread( HDF_AttributeID, HDF_Type, &Data );
00534 
00535   // restore previous error handler
00536   H5Eset_auto( old_func, old_client_data );
00537 
00538   H5Aclose( HDF_AttributeID );
00539   H5Gclose( HDF_GroupID );
00540   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00541 
00542 }
00543 
00544 template < typename T>
00545 inline void 
00546 HDFReadGroupAttribute( const std::string Filename, const std::string GroupName, const std::string ObjName, std::vector<T> &Data ) {
00547 
00548   hid_t HDF_Type, HDF_FileID, HDF_GroupID, HDF_AttributeID, HDF_DataspaceID;
00549   hsize_t HDF_StorageSize;
00550 
00551   HDF_Type = GetDataType<T>();
00552 
00553   // save old error handler
00554   herr_t ( *old_func ) ( void* );
00555   void *old_client_data;
00556 
00557   H5Eget_auto( &old_func, &old_client_data );
00558 
00559   // turn off error handling by hdf5 library
00560   H5Eset_auto( NULL, NULL );
00561 
00562   // attempt to open attribute
00563 
00564   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT );
00565   HDF_GroupID = H5Gopen( HDF_FileID, GroupName.c_str() );
00566   HDF_AttributeID = H5Aopen_name( HDF_GroupID, ObjName.c_str() );
00567 
00568   if ( HDF_FileID < 0 || HDF_GroupID < 0 || HDF_AttributeID < 0 ) {
00569     std::stringstream ss;
00570     ss << " - Warning: attribute \'" << GroupName.c_str() << "/" << ObjName.c_str() << "\' does not exist or is empty." << std::endl;
00571     H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00572     throw HDFException( ss.str() );
00573     return ;
00574   }
00575 
00576   // get space associated with dataset and its extensions
00577   HDF_DataspaceID = H5Aget_space( HDF_AttributeID );
00578 
00579   int ndims = H5Sget_simple_extent_ndims( HDF_DataspaceID );
00580 
00581   hsize_t dimsize[ ndims ];
00582 
00583   H5Sget_simple_extent_dims( HDF_DataspaceID, dimsize, NULL );
00584 
00585   HDF_StorageSize = 1;
00586   for ( int i = 0; i < ndims; ++i )
00587     HDF_StorageSize *= dimsize[ i ];
00588 
00589   // adjust the array size to hold the data
00590   Data.clear();
00591   Data.reserve( HDF_StorageSize );
00592   Data.assign( HDF_StorageSize, ( T ) 1 );
00593 
00594   H5Aread( HDF_AttributeID, HDF_Type, &Data[ 0 ] );
00595 
00596   // restore previous error handler
00597   H5Eset_auto( old_func, old_client_data );
00598 
00599   H5Aclose( HDF_AttributeID );
00600   H5Sclose( HDF_DataspaceID );
00601   H5Gclose( HDF_GroupID );
00602   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00603 }
00604 
00605 template < typename T >
00606 inline void 
00607 HDFWriteDataset( const std::string Filename, const std::string ObjName, const std::vector<T> &Data ) {
00608 
00609   hid_t
00610     HDF_FileID,
00611     HDF_DatasetID,
00612     HDF_DataspaceID,
00613     HDF_Type;
00614 
00615   hsize_t HDF_Dims;
00616 
00617   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDWR, H5P_DEFAULT );
00618 
00619   HDF_Type = GetDataType<T>();
00620 
00621   HDF_Dims = Data.size();
00622   HDF_DataspaceID = H5Screate_simple( 1, &HDF_Dims, NULL );
00623   HDF_DatasetID = H5Dcreate( HDF_FileID, ObjName.c_str(), HDF_Type,
00624                  HDF_DataspaceID, H5P_DEFAULT );
00625   H5Dwrite( HDF_DatasetID, HDF_Type, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL,
00626         H5P_DEFAULT, &Data[ 0 ] );
00627   H5Dclose( HDF_DatasetID );
00628   H5Sclose( HDF_DataspaceID );
00629 
00630   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00631 }
00632 
00633 template < typename T >
00634 inline void 
00635 HDFWriteDataset2D( const std::string Filename, const std::string ObjName, const std::vector< std::vector<T> > &Data ) {
00636 
00637   hid_t
00638     HDF_FileID,
00639     HDF_DatasetID,
00640     HDF_DataspaceID,
00641     HDF_Type;
00642 
00643   hsize_t HDF_Dims[ 2 ];
00644 
00645   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDWR, H5P_DEFAULT );
00646 
00647   HDF_Type = GetDataType<T>();
00648 
00649   HDF_Dims[ 0 ] = Data.size();
00650   HDF_Dims[ 1 ] = Data[ 0 ].size();
00651   HDF_DataspaceID = H5Screate_simple( 2, HDF_Dims, NULL );
00652   HDF_DatasetID = H5Dcreate( HDF_FileID, ObjName.c_str(), HDF_Type,
00653                  HDF_DataspaceID, H5P_DEFAULT );
00654 
00655   T *tmp = new T[ HDF_Dims[ 0 ] * HDF_Dims[ 1 ] ];
00656 
00657   unsigned k = 0;
00658   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < HDF_Dims[ 0 ]; ++i )
00659     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < HDF_Dims[ 1 ]; ++j ) {
00660       tmp[ k++ ] = ( Data[ i ] ) [ j ];
00661     }
00662 
00663   H5Dwrite( HDF_DatasetID, HDF_Type, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL,
00664         H5P_DEFAULT, tmp );
00665 
00666   delete[] tmp;
00667 
00668   H5Dclose( HDF_DatasetID );
00669   H5Sclose( HDF_DataspaceID );
00670 
00671   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00672 }
00673 
00674 template < typename T >
00675 inline void 
00676 HDFWriteDatasetVector( const std::string Filename, const std::string ObjName, const std::vector<T> &Data ) {
00677 
00678   hid_t
00679     HDF_FileID,
00680     HDF_DatasetID,
00681     HDF_DataspaceID,
00682     HDF_Type;
00683 
00684   hsize_t HDF_Dims[ 2 ];
00685 
00686   // hsize_t HDF_Dims;
00687 
00688   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDWR, H5P_DEFAULT );
00689 
00690   HDF_Type = GetDataType<T>();
00691 
00692   HDF_Dims[ 0 ] = ( hsize_t ) ( Data.size() / 3 );
00693   HDF_Dims[ 1 ] = 3;
00694 
00695   if ( Data.size() % 3 != 0 ) {
00696     std::cerr << " - Warning: Trying to write vector data in HDFWriteDatasetVector, but array length not divisible by 3!" << std::endl;
00697   }
00698 
00699   HDF_DataspaceID = H5Screate_simple( 2, HDF_Dims, NULL );
00700   HDF_DatasetID = H5Dcreate( HDF_FileID, ObjName.c_str(), H5T_NATIVE_FLOAT,
00701                  HDF_DataspaceID, H5P_DEFAULT );
00702   H5Dwrite( HDF_DatasetID, HDF_Type, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL,
00703         H5P_DEFAULT, &Data[ 0 ] );
00704   H5Dclose( HDF_DatasetID );
00705   H5Sclose( HDF_DataspaceID );
00706 
00707   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00708 }
00709 
00710 inline void 
00711 HDFCreateGroup( const std::string Filename, const std::string GroupName ) {
00712   hid_t HDF_FileID, HDF_GroupID;
00713 
00714   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDWR, H5P_DEFAULT );
00715   HDF_GroupID = H5Gcreate( HDF_FileID, GroupName.c_str(), 0 );
00716   H5Gclose( HDF_GroupID );
00717   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00718 
00719 }

00721 template < typename T >
00722 inline void 
00723 HDFWriteGroupAttribute( const std::string Filename, const std::string GroupName, const std::string ObjName, const std::vector< T > &Data ) {
00724   hid_t HDF_FileID,
00725     HDF_GroupID,
00726     HDF_AttributeID,
00727     HDF_DataspaceID,
00728     HDF_DatatypeID;
00729 
00730   hsize_t HDF_Dims;
00731 
00732   HDF_DatatypeID = GetDataType<T>();
00733 
00734   HDF_Dims = ( hsize_t ) ( Data.size() );
00735 
00736 
00737   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDWR, H5P_DEFAULT );
00738   HDF_GroupID = H5Gopen( HDF_FileID, GroupName.c_str() );
00739   HDF_DataspaceID = H5Screate_simple( 1, &HDF_Dims, NULL );
00740 
00741   HDF_AttributeID = H5Acreate( HDF_GroupID, ObjName.c_str(), HDF_DatatypeID, HDF_DataspaceID, H5P_DEFAULT );
00742   H5Awrite( HDF_AttributeID, HDF_DatatypeID, &Data[ 0 ] );
00743   H5Aclose( HDF_AttributeID );
00744   H5Sclose( HDF_DataspaceID );
00745   H5Gclose( HDF_GroupID );
00746   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00747 }

00750 template < typename T >
00751 inline void 
00752 HDFWriteGroupAttribute( const std::string Filename, const std::string GroupName, const std::string ObjName, T
00753             Data ) {
00754   hid_t
00755     HDF_FileID,
00756     HDF_GroupID,
00757     HDF_AttributeID,
00758     HDF_DataspaceID,
00759     HDF_DatatypeID;
00760 
00761   HDF_DatatypeID = GetDataType<T>();
00762 
00763   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDWR, H5P_DEFAULT );
00764   HDF_GroupID = H5Gopen( HDF_FileID, GroupName.c_str() );
00765   HDF_DataspaceID = H5Screate( H5S_SCALAR );
00766   HDF_AttributeID = H5Acreate( HDF_GroupID, ObjName.c_str(), HDF_DatatypeID,
00767                    HDF_DataspaceID, H5P_DEFAULT );
00768   H5Awrite( HDF_AttributeID, HDF_DatatypeID, &Data );
00769   H5Aclose( HDF_AttributeID );
00770   H5Sclose( HDF_DataspaceID );
00771   H5Gclose( HDF_GroupID );
00772   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00773 }
00774 
00775 template <>
00776 inline void 
00777 HDFWriteGroupAttribute<std::string>( const std::string Filename, const std::string GroupName, const std::string ObjName, std::string Data ) {
00778 
00779   hid_t
00780     HDF_FileID,
00781     HDF_GroupID,
00782     HDF_AttributeID,
00783     HDF_DataspaceID,
00784     HDF_DatatypeID;
00785 
00786   HDF_DatatypeID = H5Tcopy( H5T_C_S1 );
00787 
00788   H5Tset_size( HDF_DatatypeID, Data.size() );
00789   H5Tset_strpad( HDF_DatatypeID, H5T_STR_NULLPAD );
00790 
00791   HDF_FileID = H5Fopen( Filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDWR, H5P_DEFAULT );
00792   HDF_GroupID = H5Gopen( HDF_FileID, GroupName.c_str() );
00793   HDF_DataspaceID = H5Screate( H5S_SCALAR );
00794   HDF_AttributeID = H5Acreate( HDF_GroupID, ObjName.c_str(), HDF_DatatypeID,
00795                    HDF_DataspaceID, H5P_DEFAULT );
00796   H5Awrite( HDF_AttributeID, HDF_DatatypeID, Data.c_str() );
00797   H5Aclose( HDF_AttributeID );
00798   H5Sclose( HDF_DataspaceID );
00799   H5Gclose( HDF_GroupID );
00800   H5Fclose( HDF_FileID );
00801 }
